name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing scalable and reliable backend systems across diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python**, with hands-on expertise in **AWS** cloud services for seamless deployment and infrastructure management. Demonstrated knowledge of message brokers such as **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **NATS** to ensure efficient data processing and communication.

Strong experience in developing integrations and automation through **Workato** and building robust applications that meet high compliance standards. Known for effective mentorship and exceptional communication skills, I excel at fostering problem-solving environments that enhance team performance and drive project success.

My technical repertoire includes programming with **Java** and **Golang**, as well as a strong foundation in backend principles that support system scalability and reliability. I am passionate about leveraging technology to improve operational efficiencies and deliver high-quality solutions autonomously.
